definition: Baileys Irish Cream (brand of alcoholic drink)

sentences.english: How do almond-flavored liqueurs derive their flavor?
sentences.chinese: 杏味甜酒是怎樣得到這種味道的？

sentences.english: I ordered the best wine on the menu, regardless of price or taste.
sentences.chinese: 我叫了菜單上最好的甜酒，不管價錢多少，味道好壞。

sentences.english: She brought me a bottle of home made fermented brown rice.
sentences.chinese: 她給我一瓶自制糙米甜酒釀。

sentences.english: He has knocked back two double rums.
sentences.chinese: 他喝掉了兩杯雙份甜酒。

sentences.english: The effect of different types of starch of rice material on the quality of fermented glutinous rice was studied.
sentences.chinese: 該文對不同澱粉質大米發酵釀製米甜酒進行了研究。

sentences.english: Take heed of the vinegar of sweet wine, and the anger of good-nature.
sentences.chinese: 當心甜酒當中所含的醋，以及溫和性情裏的憤怒。

sentences.english: We had all the champagne we could drink and liqueurs to follow.
sentences.chinese: 我們拼命地喝香檳，接着又喝甜酒。

sentences.english: It is very light in alcohol, lusciously sweet in taste and a wonderful dessert wine.
sentences.chinese: 高酒精度，有着迷人的口感，是一款很好的甜酒。

sentences.english: The most familiar after meal alcoholic is quick of speech alcoholic, it calls sweet alcoholic again.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的餐後酒是利口酒，它又叫香甜酒。

sentences.english: “Take a single malt instead of a dessert wine, ” he urges.
sentences.chinese: “用單一的麥芽來代替甜酒，”他鼓勵說。

sentences.english: Among them was cassis, a black currant dessert wine.
sentences.chinese: 桌上擺放着黑醋栗，一種黑加侖甜酒。

sentences.english: Take head of the vinegar of sweet wine, and the anger of good-nature.
sentences.chinese: 當心甜酒當中所含的醋，以及溫和性情裏的憤怒。

sentences.english: And in the bottom o' the carriage they be to put a noggin o' rum in a small bottle, and chalk it up to my account.
sentences.chinese: 馬車裏叫他們放上一小瓶甜酒，記在我的帳上。

sentences.english: Where we can get rum and salty wenches…
sentences.chinese: 我們可以喝甜酒，還有鹹溼的女人。

sentences.english: Hot Buttered Rum is a traditional holiday cocktail of rum and sugar.
sentences.chinese: 熱奶油蘭姆酒是甜酒和糖的傳統節日雞尾酒。

sentences.english: I prefer dry wine to rum.
sentences.chinese: 甜酒我還是喜歡喝乾酒。

definition: name of a famous Tang dynasty wine/same as 白酒[bai2 jiu3]
to brew/to make (wine, vinegar, soybean paste etc) by fermentation
"yellow wine" (mulled rice wine, usually served warm)
